name: Comancheria
description: This boozy yet balanced drink from Rickhouse Bar in San Francisco has hints of tobacco, smoke, and apple.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce Balcones Baby Blue Corn Whiskey
2 dashes OId Fashioned Bitters (such as Fee Bros.)

recipeInstructions.text: Make Tobacco Tincture: Place moonshine and tobacco in a small bowl. Let rest 30 minutes.
Strain liquid to remove tobacco. Pour liquid through a cheesecloth and reserve. Note: Tobacco tincture will last for about 3 weeks.
Make Cocktail: Place applejack, whiskey, Cynar, bitters, and tincture in a cocktail shaker. Stir until well combined.
Place one large ice cube in a highball glass. Strain cocktail into glass and garnish with lemon twist.
